sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_REIMBURSE_LIST(
PROJECT_NAME, BZ, AMOUNT, RELATE_DATA,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME, ORG, ORG_TREE) values(
#projectName#, #bz#, #amount#, #relateData#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #org#, #orgTree#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_REIMBURSE_LIST SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.BZ AS bz, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.AMOUNT AS amount, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.RELATE_DATA AS relateData,
TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.ID AS id, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.STATUS AS status, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.CREATED AS created, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.UPDATED AS updated, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_REIMBURSE_LIST where TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_REIMBURSE_LIST
PROJECT_NAME=#projectName# BZ=#bz# AMOUNT=#amount# RELATE_DATA=#relateData#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.BZ AS bz, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.AMOUNT AS amount, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.RELATE_DATA AS relateData,
TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.ID AS id, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.STATUS AS status, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.CREATED AS created, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.UPDATED AS updated, TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_REIMBURSE_LIST WHERE TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.STATUS = '1'
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_REIMBURSE_LIST WHERE TB_REIMBURSE_LIST.STATUS = '1'
